text: Ke manisaharula'i ascarya lagyo ki hamile tiniharumadhyebata nai e'uta manisala'i adesa pathayaum ki manisaharula'i cetavani suna'ide'u ra imana bha'ekaharula'i subhasandesa di'ihala ki uniharuko palanakartakaham uniharula'i pura pratiphala ra ucca sthana prapta hunecha. Kaphiraharule bhane ki yo manisa spastarupama jadugara ho
